headline: Netflix may adjust WBD bid to an all-cash offer: Bloomberg
summary: According to a Bloomberg report, streaming giant Netflix (NFLX) is exploring amending its bid for Warner Bros. Discovery (WBD) to an all-cash offer. This comes as Paramount Skydance (PSKY) launches a proxy battle after WBD rejected its hostile takeover offer. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.

content.title: Netflix may adjust WBD bid to an all-cash offer: Bloomberg
content.description:
According to a Bloomberg report, streaming giant Netflix (NFLX) is exploring amending its bid for Warner Bros. Discovery (WBD) to an all-cash offer. This comes as Paramount Skydance (PSKY) launches a proxy battle after WBD rejected its hostile takeover offer.

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.

headline: Netflix May Amend Warner Bros. Bid to Make It All Cash
summary: Netflix is working on revised terms for its Warner Bros. Discovery acquisition and has discussed making an all-cash offer for the company's studios and streaming businesses, people familiar with the discussions said. Chris Palmeri has more on "Bloomberg The Close."

content.title: Netflix May Amend Warner Bros. Bid to Make It All Cash
content.description: Netflix is working on revised terms for its Warner Bros. Discovery acquisition and has discussed making an all-cash offer for the company's studios and streaming businesses, people familiar with the discussions said. Chris Palmeri has more on "Bloomberg The Close."
content.summary: Netflix is working on revised terms for its Warner Bros. Discovery acquisition and has discussed making an all-cash offer for the company's studios and streaming businesses, people familiar with the discussions said. Chris Palmeri has more on "Bloomberg The Close."

headline: Netflix Weighs Amending Warner Bros. Bid to Make It All Cash
summary: Under the original agreement, Warner Bros. shareholders were to receive $23.25 in cash and $4.50 in Netflix common stock, with certain adjustments in place if shares of the streaming giant fall below $97.91.  Since the company’s pursuit of Warner Bros. began in October, Netflix shares have lost about a quarter of their value.  After choosing Netflix in early December, Warner Bros. has faced repeated efforts by Paramount to scuttle that deal and accept its offer.

content.title: Netflix Weighs Amending Warner Bros. Bid to Make It All Cash
content.summary: Under the original agreement, Warner Bros. shareholders were to receive $23.25 in cash and $4.50 in Netflix common stock, with certain adjustments in place if shares of the streaming giant fall below $97.91.  Since the company’s pursuit of Warner Bros. began in October, Netflix shares have lost about a quarter of their value.  After choosing Netflix in early December, Warner Bros. has faced repeated efforts by Paramount to scuttle that deal and accept its offer.

headline: Netflix Preparing to Make Warner Bid All-Cash
summary: Netflix  is preparing to make its bid for  Warner Bros. Discovery  studios and HBO Max streaming business all cash, according to people familiar with the matter, as Paramount continues pushing its competing offer.  Netflix struck a $72 billion cash-and-stock deal with Warner in December.  Making it all cash would simplify Netflix’s deal and could sway some shareholders who have been weighing the two offers.

content.title: Netflix Preparing to Make Warner Bid All-Cash
content.summary: Netflix  is preparing to make its bid for  Warner Bros. Discovery  studios and HBO Max streaming business all cash, according to people familiar with the matter, as Paramount continues pushing its competing offer.  Netflix struck a $72 billion cash-and-stock deal with Warner in December.  Making it all cash would simplify Netflix’s deal and could sway some shareholders who have been weighing the two offers.
